predicate.note: Frames file for 'find' based on file created by Chris, survey of initial sentences of big corpus, and minimal comparison with 'receive'

roleset.name: discovery

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: I'd like *trace=I* to find a flight that goes from Boston to Orlando.
example.arg: a flight that goes from Boston to Orlando

example.name: found a sentence!
example.text: The study also found that the colony's consumers feel more pressured than those in any of the other surveyed markets.
example.arg: the colony's consumers feel more pressured than those in any of the other surveyed markets

roleset.note: Note again that the "that" is not included in the argument just as for all the verbs of saying. If the complementizer is a wh-word ("when", "who", etc) or "if", then it will be included.

example.name: with attributive
example.text: State courts found the rates illegal.
